  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService()
      Constructs a new UserService with a default UserDao instance.

  • Method Details

    • authenticateUser

      public boolean authenticateUser(String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on the provided email and password. Generates and stores a JWT token upon successful authentication.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      password - the user's plain-text password
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, false otherwise

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(User user)
      Registers a new user by hashing the password, saving the user to the database, and generating a JWT token.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be registered

    • getUserByEmail

      public User getUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      Returns:
      the User object if found, otherwise null

    • hashPassword

      public String hashPassword(String password) throws Exception
      Hashes the given password using PBKDF2 with HmacSHA256 and a static salt.
      Parameters:
      password - the plain-text password to hash
      Returns:
      the hashed password as a Base64-encoded string
      Throws:
      Exception - if the hashing algorithm fails

    • getUserBookCount

      public int getUserBookCount(Long userId)
      Retrieves the number of books currently associated with the given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the number of books the user has

    • decreaseUserBookCount

      public void decreaseUserBookCount(Long userId)
      Decreases the number of books associated with the given user by one.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user)
      Updates the user's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user object containing updated information

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(Long id)
      Retrieves a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the User object if found, otherwise null

    • getUserRole

      public String getUserRole(Long userId)
      Retrieves the role of a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the role of the user as a string

    • getUserPhone

      public String getUserPhone(String email)
      Retrieves the phone number of a user by their email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      Returns:
      the user's phone number as a string, or null if not found
